content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1460722558111{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” title=”Welcome to School Alumni!” sep_enable=”true”][/stm_title][stm_blockquote cite=”Mrs. Abigail Thompson, Alumni Relations Coordinator” footer_space_t=”35px”]Welcome back to your school! We hope you enjoy being a part of our extended international community that brings together former Secondary School students, parents and staff from around the world. If you are not yet an Secondary School Alumni member, register today through the Alumni Community section and reconnect with a global network that just keeps growing. We look foward to hearing from you. With best wishes,[/stm_blockquote][stm_spacing sm_spacing=”45px” xs_spacing=”45px”][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-6 vc_col-md-6″][stm_single_image img_id=”1231″ img_size=”570×380″ img_responsive_enable=”true”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1455265528810{padding-top: 45px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” title=”Strengthening Relationships” sep_enable=”true” sep_margin_b=”60px”][/stm_title][stm_slider css=”.vc_custom_1455265547432{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][stm_slider_item img_id=”1234″ img_size=”635×450″][stm_slider_item img_id=”816″ img_size=”635×450″][/stm_slider][/vc_column][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1457022817106{padding-left: 30px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_text_box button_color_scheme=”white” button_position=”right” title_color=”custom” text_color=”custom” stm_bg_color=”green” button_text=”View our Network” button_link=”url:%23||” title_color_custom=”#ffffff” padding_top=”61px” padding_right=”60px” padding_bottom=”50px” padding_left=”95px” css=”.vc_custom_1457023491273{margin-bottom: 43px !important;margin-left: -85px !important;}” text_color_custom=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”36px” text_margin_b=”24px”]We aim to strengthen relationships between School alumnae, students, and soon-to-be alumnae while maximizing potential in both personal and professional lives.[/stm_text_box][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1455265993559{margin-bottom: 26px !important;}”]The balance Secondary School maintains between honoring the past and remaining committed to the future is one of its most compelling attributes. We hope you`ll stay in touch, join our network, and bolster our community by supporting Secondary School students today.[/vc_column_text][stm_social_networks][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1456657982056{margin-bottom: 96px !important;padding-top: 38px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ title_align=”center” subtitle_color=”dark-gray” sep_color=”green” title=”Discover our School” sep_enable=”true” subtitle_enable=”true” subtitle_margin_b=”53px”]Our School is an independent day school set in beautiful grounds at
Sommerson Bay, some three miles south of the City of California.[/stm_title][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_action_box img_id=”517″ title=”Extra Curricular” action_box_link=”url:%23||”][stm_spacing sm_spacing=”30px” xs_spacing=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_action_box img_id=”102″ title=”School Prospectus” action_box_link=”url:%23||”][stm_spacing sm_spacing=”30px” xs_spacing=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12″][stm_action_box img_id=”105″ title=”School Broadsheet” action_box_link=”url:%23||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
